subject: Public Speaking
title: The Storytelling Mindset
description: A quick win: understand The Storytelling Mindset.

hook.text: Storytellers see narratives everywhere. It's a practiced skill.

buildup.text: Train yourself to ask: what's the story here?

discovery.text: Every news event, conversation, or experience contains potential.

twist.text: The mindset shift: from information collector to story hunter.

climax.text: Once you develop this mindset, content creation becomes effortless.

punchline.text: Hunt for stories daily. They compound.

quiz.question: What is the storytelling mindset?
options: Practiced skill of seeing narratives everywhere
